name: Bunny Mania 2
description: Bunny Mania around the world! Command lots of bunnies, and help them to reach the bunny house. Build bridges, drill holes, and collect vegetables Key features: - 4 game worlds, 60 levels - 10 tools, powerups and crates - elevators and traps - advanced hint...
minimum_requirements: OS: 32 bit and 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo, AMD Athlon Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: any windows XP/Vista/8/10 compatible APU or GPU Storage: 110 MB available space Sound Card: windows XP/Vista/8/10 compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: 32 bit and 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo, AMD Athlon Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: any windows XP/Vista/8/10 compatible APU or GPU Storage: 110 MB available space Sound Card: windows XP/Vista/8/10 compatible sound card
